short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will allow you to easily retrieve your session cookies each time you use FounderScout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FounderScout is the radical solution for investors in their quest for finding talent. This extension of FounderScout will allow you to easily retrieve your session cookies from LinkedIn each time you use FounderScout.
